item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.DayPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.MonthPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.Company, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.StructuralUnit, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.CustomerOrder, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.BusinessActivity, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.GLAccount AS Item, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.AmountIncomeTurnover, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.SecondPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.MinutePeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.HourPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.WeekPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.YearPeriod, 0 AS ProfitLoss, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.PlanningPeriod, 0 AS Deviation, 0 AS Percent, 0 AS IncomeRejection, 0 AS ExpenseVariance, 0 AS IncomePercent, 0 AS ExpensePercent FROM AccumulationRegister.IncomeAndExpensesForecast.Turnovers(, , Auto, PlanningPeriod = &PlanningPeriod OR &PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.EmptyRef)) AS IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers

item.name: DataSet2
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.DayPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.MonthPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.Company, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.StructuralUnit, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.CustomerOrder, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.BusinessActivity, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.GLAccount AS Item, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.AmountIncomeTurnover AS AmountIncomeTurnoverFact, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover AS AmountExpenseTurnoverFact, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.SecondPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.MinutePeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.HourPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.WeekPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers.YearPeriod, 0 AS ProfitLossFact, 0 AS Deviation, 0 AS Percent, 0 AS IncomeRejection, 0 AS ExpenseVariance, 0 AS IncomePercent, 0 AS ExpensePercent FROM AccumulationRegister.IncomeAndExpenses.Turnovers(, , Auto, ) AS IncomeAndExpensesForecastTurnovers

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)-SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL(SUM(AmountIncomeTurnoverFact), 0) - ISNULL(SUM(AmountExpenseTurnoverFact), 0) - (SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)-SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover)) ) * 100 / ( SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)-SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) ) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountIncomeTurnoverFact), 0) - SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountIncomeTurnover) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountExpenseTurnoverFact), 0) - SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountExpenseTurnover) END

v8:item.v8:content: Forecast of income and expenses (for shipment)
Прогноз по доходам и расходам (по отгрузке)
Income and expenses variance analysis (by shipment)
План-фактный анализ доходов и расходов (по отгрузке)
